Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-22365 affecting package pam for versions less than 1.5.1-6
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-22365 affecting package pam for versions less than 1.5.1-6. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package pam is earlier than 1.5.1-6, affected by CVE-2024-22365
